column2: "Hee hee! Nice work! I don't even have to read your report to see that. You really had some fine moves!"
"You sure made those hostiles dance and suffer before you wiped them out completely. Your Ranger skills are just dreamy."
"Working with you meant less kills for me, but I did enjoy seeing all that carnage. Do you like to watch, too?"
"Anyway, I want to give you a little something as thanks for all the killing and maiming."
"And maybe next time we can make even more hostiles suffer and then suffer some more!"
